txt.en: You found this broken-off giant fang as a reminder of the great battle you did with the Ancient Rock-worm. You should bring this trophy to Sabert to show him how large the worms were beginning to grow in the Teeming Nests.

Sabert gives a long whistle as you hand him the fang of the Ancient Rock-worm.\n\n'That is a fine trophy, [placeholder]! You must have had quite a fight on your hands as you wrestled with this one. It is lucky this tooth did not pierce your armour before you broke it loose from its owner!'
You have slain a formidable giant worm and now bear his fang as a trophy of your battle.
Bring the fang to Sabert in Stangard
Sabert stands at the gate of Stangard.\n\nYou should bring the fang you collected from the corpse of the Ancient Rock-worm to Sabert.
